name: Rock Cycle Game (Beta)
description:
Info:

Learn the Rock Cycle and save the world from the Ultimate Evil. S'mores are good. Rocks are bad. Use spells that you learn along the way to crush rocks into sediments  or melt them back into lava. It's okay, it's the cycle of... rocks.

Notes:
  • Use 'space bar' or 'enter' to select.
  • Use arrow keys to navigate.
  • Use 'escape' to exit menu.
